    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Aracné: ciència en xarxa</string>
            <string language="en">Aracné: science in network</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aracné: Wissenschaft im Netz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aracné : la science dans le réseau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aracné: ciência na rede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aracné: scienza nella rete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Aracnι: επιστήμη στο δίκτυο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Dos crèdits interactius ( amb la possibilitat de recórrer tres trajectes diferents: bàsic, ampliat i complet). Hi ha un dedicat a la geologia, un racó de l'Univers, i un altre dedicat a la biologia, habitants del planeta. Accés restringit a usuaris edu365 i xtec.</string>
            <string language="en">Two interactive credits (with the possibility of three itineraries: basic, extended and complete). One is devoted to geology, a corner of the Universe, another to biology, inhabitants of the planet. Access is restricted to users of edu365 and xtec websites.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">biologia</string>
            <string language="en">biology</string>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">botànica</string>
            <string language="en">botany</string>
            <string language="es">botánica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exploració de la terra</string>
            <string language="en">exploration of the earth</string>
            <string language="es">exploración de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geologia</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">microbiologia</string>
            <string language="en">microbiology</string>
            <string language="es">microbiología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la naturalesa</string>
            <string language="en">natural sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">zoologia</string>
            <string language="en">zoology</string>
            <string language="es">zoología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei interaktive Gutschriften (mit der 
Möglichkeit von drei Reisewegen: grundlegend, ausgedehnt und 
komplett). Man wird Geologie, eine Ecke des Universums, andere 
zur Biologie, Einwohner des Planeten gewidmet. Zugriff wird zu 
den Benutzern von edu365 und von xtec Web site eingeschränkt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux crédits interactifs (avec la possibilité de
trois itinéraires : de base, étendu et complet). On est 
consacré à la géologie, un coin de l'univers, un autre à la 
biologie, habitants de la planète. L'accès est limité aux 
utilisateurs d'edu365 et de sites Web de xtec.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois créditos interativos (com a possibilidade de
três itineraries: básico, prolongado e completo). Se é 
devotado à geologia, um canto do universo, outro à biologia, 
habitantes do planeta. O acesso é restringido aos usuários de 
edu365 e de Web site do xtec.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due accreditamenti interattivi (con la 
possibilità di tre itinerari: di base, esteso e completo). 
Si è dedicato alla geologia, un angolo dell'universo, un altro 
a biologia, abitanti del pianeta. L'accesso è limitato agli 
utenti di edu365 e dei Web site del xtec.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο διαλογικές πιστώσεις (με τη δυνατότητα τριών 
περιηγήσεων: βασικών, εκτεταμένος και πλήρης). Κάποιος 
αφιερώνεται στη γεωλογία, μια γωνία του κόσμου, άλλη στη 
βιολογία, κάτοικοι του πλανήτη. Η πρόσβαση είναι 
περιορισμένη στους χρήστες edu365 και xtec των ιστοχώρων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Botanik</string>
          </keyword>
